ygData.msgSnippet: Straight Shot smiles and pats Lord Elder on the shoulder.  That s okay Sir it s kinda hard ta remember all the Autobots that are back there.  Anyway, Thanks

Straight Shot smiles and pats Lord Elder on the shoulder.

" That's okay Si=
r it's kinda hard ta remember all the Autobots that are back there.  Anyway=
, Thanks for being honest with me about Tucson. So I heard right...  Someon=
e mentioned Tucson Prime in the transmissions..  Good for him, He worked re=
ally hard ta get ta where he is, and ta become a Prime..  The Matrix made a=
 great choice."  

She now picks up on Tucson Prime's location.

" Accordin=
g to my sensors, he's in the Black Fortress, beneath the foundation in some=
 sort of deep tunnel system.  Well, I just can't sit around and wait for hi=
m can I?  After all, he's gonna need me.  When we work together, we hardly =
miss our targets.   It's real rare that we do but most of the time, any arr=
ow that gets shot by us, usually hits its mark.  Sorry, can't stick around =
Lord Elder, I gotta get off my aft and do something."

She darts toward the=
 exit door, and then forgets the most important aspect. Her inability to fl=
y, and the fact that her alt form is a weapon not a vehicle.

" Oh, yeah, I=
 forgot.  I - can't fly and I don't transform into a vehicle.  Think I can =
borrow one of your shuttles sir?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston C=
arroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Who: LORD ELDER, Elita, Straight Shot=

> Location: Ark - Command Center
> 
> > " Elita, it's been a long time, I =
missed you."
> >
> > She then looks to Lord Elder. She had met him at one t=
ime, but did not
> > get the chance to really know him.
> >
> > "Lord Elder=
, Right? It's been a long time, and I think we were
> > introduced a while =
ago, but, maybe ya don't remember who I am. If not,
> > I'm Straight Shot, =
Tucson's half sister and his all time favorite weapon of choice.
> > But we=
're not cheating, he does all the aiming and firing when he uses me.
> > Oh=
, yeah, ya might not know that part. My alt modes are Cross Bow and
> > reg=
ular bow. So, um, speakn' of my half brother.. He is okay right?"
> 
> Lord=
 Elder turned around to take in Straight Shot, his optics widened
> slightl=
y, "Um, y . . yes" Elder stammered slightly trying to get his
> words out, =
clearly at a loss. "I'm sorry." He said as he stood to face
> her. "I had q=
uite forgotten you were back there. I think I'm going to
> have to make an =
inventory of who's back there." He said as he
> chuckled.
> 
> He glanced b=
ack at the board which was intermittently giving radio
> responses from the=
 various Autobots and Maximal's as the ark
> communication was able to rece=
ive it.
> 
> From what I can gather Tuscon is on his way out with Rodimus P=
rime,
> Windlord and Nightlight as well." He paused and mumbled, "I can't
>=
 gaurantee what shape they'll be in though."
> 
> A radio transmission came=
 through from Lord Persues at the old Maximal
> Base . . .
> 
> > "Tuscon, =
I'm reading your location, please let us know if you need asistance," Perse=
us replied.  "Lord Elder, do you read?"
> 
> Elder turned as he got the tra=
nsmission, "Yes, I am reading you loud
> and clear." Elder slid back into h=
is seat as he attenuated the
> transmission, "We are standing by to receive=
 any wounded from the
> rescue mission, and we have Straight Shot here for =
any back up."
> 
> Elder glanced back at her grinning somewhat sheepishly, =
hoping that
> his assumption was right.
> 
> (TAG)

> Preston
